Uses of Interface
com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.PartitionResolver

  • Packages that use PartitionResolver 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache
    Provides an implementation of distributed object caching that can leverage GemFire's distribution capabilities.

    • Uses of PartitionResolver in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache

      Subinterfaces of PartitionResolver in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FixedPartitionResolver<K,V>
      Implementers of interface FixedPartitionResolver helps to achieve explicit mapping of a "user defined" partition to a data member node.
      Methods in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache that return PartitionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PartitionResolver<K,V> PartitionAttributes.getPartitionResolver()
      Returns the PartitionResolver set for custom partitioning
      Methods in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache with parameters of type PartitionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PartitionAttributesFactory<K,V> PartitionAttributesFactory.setPartitionResolver(PartitionResolver<K,V> resolver)
      Sets the PartitionResolver for the PartitionRegion.
